0.0: Enter Topic in Assesment Input Section
0.1: Browse Folder of File in Files Section
0.2: Select File of choice and click Select

1.0: Browse Folder of File in Files Section
1.1: Select File of choice and click Select
1.2: Select Second File in Assesment Input Section

2.0: Enter text in main Text Box
2.1: You can open file as well
2.2: Browse Folder of File in Files Section
2.3: Select File of choice and click Select

3.0: Enter text in main Text Box
3.1: You can open file as well
3.2: Browse Folder of File in Files Section
3.3: Select File of choice and click Select

5.0: Select File of choice and click Select
5.2: Enter command line input in Assesment Section
5.3: Output will be visible in command prompt
